channel.title: [PI] Compiler Doesn't Work
channel.description: I tried to compile my server but it showed up this message: [code=smarty]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I already have Java Installed on my computer, I don't know why it shows this message. Please Help.

item.title: [PI] Compiler Doesn't Work

item.title: [PI] Compiler Doesn't Work
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:4, topic:371522”][quote author=Lord Typhis link=topic=467607.msg3418989#msg3418989 date=1291344922]

Delete the c on java, and try again.

Don’t post things you yourself don’t know how to do.

Go to your compiler - right click - press edit -

Then put this in:

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause

At the beggining, where it says: jdk1.6.0_14
Change the “14” to your current java.

I liek rep too.
[/quote]

  1. Don’t ask for rep
  2. Use [ code] [ /code][/quote]
    All I need is one more rep point XD

Read full topic

pause

At the beggining, where it says: jdk1.6.0_14
Change the “14” to your current java.

item.title: [PI] Compiler Doesn't Work

@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Pest:

Delete the c on java, and try again.

Don’t post things you yourself don’t know how to do.

Go to your compiler - right click - press edit -

Then put this in:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

I tried to compile my server but it showed up this message:
